channel.title: I need help with a couple cannot find symbol errors
channel.description:
I dont know what i should do to make these work so could someone tell me what i need to add for these errors.
Cannot find symbol symbol : variable p location : class client int meleeDef = misc.random(p.meleeDef()); ^ Cannot find symbol symbol : variable p location : class NPCHandler if(p.GetHitNPC(Player) == true ( ^

item.title: I need help with a couple cannot find symbol errors
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Nuke207, post:3, topic:246507”]change the “(” to a {
and I think change int to Int[/quote]
Lol.
You don’t have an identifier for p, in other words the server doesn’t know what p stands for, either remove it or make it actually declared as something.

Read full topic

location : class client
